input.activity_signal: Company appears active based on: 1) Wikipedia entries confirming WOW! (Wide Open West) as an established cable/broadband provider, 2) 2022 PR Newswire article about WOW!'s wireless offering with Reach Mobile being available "enterprise-wide", 3) Web search results showing current marketing of "high-speed wireless Internet, home phone service and Cable TV service", and 4) FCC filing from 2021 for VoIP numbering authorization indicating recent regulatory compliance efforts.
input.product_summary: WOW! Internet, Cable and Phone is a cable and broadband service provider offering residential and business internet, cable TV, phone services, and VoIP services to customers in multiple markets.
